name: Anima - Gate of Memories
blurb: Anima Gate of Memories is an action RPG set in the Anima Beyond Fantasy world featuring a deep compelling story and exciting game play

rewards.reward: No Reward
Our Thanks! - You will receive a hearty thank you for showing your support
Wallpaper - Thank you for your support! Prior to the game release you will receive a package of 3 HD computer wallpapers of Anima Gate of Memories art.
Your Name in the Credits - Your name will appear in the credits of the game. Plus you will receive the package of HD computer wallpapers.

Digital Art Book - Prior to the games release you will receive an exclusive digital art book of Anima Gate of Memories. Plus you will also get your name in the credits and the package of HD computer wallpapers.

When it is Released, You Will Get the Game - When the game is released you will get a free download of it. Plus you will receive the digital art book, your name will appear in the credits, and you will get the package of HD computer wallpapers.

Game and Soundtrack - When the game is released you will receive a free download of it and a digital copy of the game's soundtrack. Plus you will receive the HD computer wallpapers, your name will appear in the credits, and you will receive the digital art book.

The Unleashed Book - When the game is released you will receive a free download of it, and a special code to unlock the Unleashed Book, Ergo\u2019s true form. Plus you will receive the HD computer wallpapers, your name will appear in the credits, you will receive the digital art book, and the soundtrack.

Art Poster - When the game is released you will receive a poster featuring the main characters of Anima Gate of Memories. Domestic shipping is included, for international shipping add $10. Plus you will receive a free download of the game, the unleashed book code, the soundtrack, the digital art book, your name will appear in the credits, and you will get the HD computer wallpapers!

3 Times the Fun - When the game is released you will receive 3 free downloads of it, each with their own unleashed book code. Plus you will receive the art poster (add $10 for international shipping), the soundtrack, the digital art book, your name will appear in the credits, and you will get the HD computer wallpapers!

Limited Edition -When the game is released you will receive a boxed DVD version of Gate of Memories (with its own unleashed book code and skins pack) with an authentication certificate.. Plus you will receive 2 free downloads, each with their own unleashed book code, the soundtrack, the artbook, the art poster, your name will appear in the credits and you will get the HD computer wallpapers!  Domestic shipping is included, for international shipping add $10

NOTE ABOUT THE LIMITED EDITION:
All backers whose pledges are above the Limited Edition pledge to The Bearer Miniature pledge level will also receive a limited edition DVD version of Gate of Memories.

Show Your Love - When the game is released you will get an Anima t-shirt. Domestic shipping is included, for international shipping add $10. Plus you will receive 3 free downloads of the game, each with their own book unleashed code, the art poster (International shipping is covered by the $10 added for the shirt), the soundtrack, the digital art book, your name will appear in the credits, and you will get the HD computer wallpapers!

Alpha/Beta Access - As soon as it is ready, you will get access to a demo version of the game. You will be able to test various sections of the game and give direct feedback. Plus, when the game is released, you will receive 3 free downloads of the game, each with their own book unleashed code, the t-shirt (add $10 for international shipping), the art poster (International shipping is covered by the $10 added for the shirt), the soundtrack, the digital art book, your name will appear in the credits, and you will get the HD computer wallpapers!

The Bearer Miniature - When the game is released you will receive a limited edition miniature of The Bearer, sculpted by the world renowned artist Juan Navarro Perez. Domestic shipping is included, for international shipping add $10. Plus you will receive 3 free downloads of the game, each with their own book unleashed code, the t-shirt (International shipping is covered by the $10 added for the miniature), the art poster (International shipping is covered by the $10 added for the miniature), the soundtrack, the digital art book, your name will appear in the credits and you will get the HD computer wallpapers!

Legendary Collectors Box -When the game is released you will receive a limited edition deluxe box which include a DVD version of the game with its own unleashed book code and the skins pack, a DVD version of the BSO, a DVD version of the artbook, a Gate of Memories USB Keychain, the miniature of The Bearer, the Nathaniel medallion, a set of Gate of Memories postcards, a special card signed by all the development team, an original sketch draw by Wen Yu Li and an authentication certificate. Plus you will receive 3 free downloads of the game, each with their own unleashed book code, 2 t-shirts, the art poster, your name will appear in the credits and you will get the HD computer wallpapers! Domestic shipping is included, for international shipping add $10. 

NOTE ABOUT THE LEGENDARY COLLECTOR BOX
All backers whose pledges will be above this pledge will also receive the Legendary Collector Box as well.

You will get to collaborate with developers on a creature design for both Anima Gate of Memories and the role playing books. Your input will be used on how it looks, its attacks and defensive maneuvers, and any other issues that need to be addressed. Plus, when the game is released, you will receive one legendary collector box, 3 free downloads of the game, each with their own unleashed book code, 2 t-shirts, the art poster, the game soundtrack, your name will appear in the credits and you will get the HD computer wallpapers! Domestic shipping is included, for international shipping add $10.

Visit Gaia - Based upon your photo as reference and your preferences, our lead artist will make a piece of art of you as a character in the Anima world. This piece of art will be sent to you and later used in official Anima setting products. Plus, when the game is released, you will receive 3 free downloads of the game, each with their own unleashed book code, the bearer miniature (add $10 for international shipping), the t-shirt (International shipping is covered by the earlier shipping charge), the art poster (International shipping is covered by the earlier shipping charge), the soundtrack, the digital art book, your name will appear in the credits, and you will get the HD computer wallpapers!

Become Part of Gaia - Your name and appearance will be used in a relevant point in the Anima Gate of Memories game. It will also appear in other Anima products or future games. Also, you will be able to design with us one quest in the game, adding your ideas to the game. Plus, when the game is released, you will receive 5 free downloads of the game, each with their own Unleashed Book code, we will make a piece of art based on you, you will get the bearer miniature (add $10 for international shipping), the t-shirt (International shipping is covered by the earlier shipping charge), the art poster (International shipping is covered by the earlier shipping charge), the soundtrack, the digital art book, your name will appear in the credits, and you will get the HD computer wallpapers!

Design Your Own Character - You will get to collaborate on the design of a character that will be used in a prominent way in Anima Gate of Memories. This character may be used in other Anima products, or future games. Plus, when the game is released, you will receive 10 free downloads of the game, each with their own unleashed book code, your name will be used in Gaia, we will make a piece of art based on you, you will get the bearer miniature (add $10 for international shipping), the t-shirt (International shipping is covered by the earlier shipping charge), the art poster (International shipping is covered by the earlier shipping charge), the soundtrack, the digital art book, your name will appear in the credits, and you will get the HD computer wallpapers!

Executive Producer and More\u2026 - For pledging at this exemplary level you will be featured in the credits as the Executive Producer. Additionally you will have direct contact with the development teams and may propose anything that comes to mind for your pledge. Plus, when the game is released, you will receive 10 free downloads of the game, each with their own book unleashed code, your name will be used in Gaia, we will make a piece of art based on you, you will get the bearer miniature (don\u2019t worry about the shipping costs), the t-shirt, the art poster, the soundtrack, the digital art book, your name will appear in the credits, and you will get the HD computer wallpapers!
